channel.title: [REQ] helpfull feedback
channel.description:
ok i started using matesqouia and started to try and work out what it/i could do
the first i made was this. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2w5r781.jpg[/img] nothing done to it just edited the colours and addes to spikes
these are all in order from the first model i made [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2nakv4l.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2zipx85.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/10gefmd.jpg[/img]
i guess my noobish crap wont be liked by any one but i mainly posted for the feedback on how to improve, not to get told wether they where good or bad
hope some one finds them amusing, but we all start some where :(

item.title: [REQ] helpfull feedback
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:13, topic:275868”]Give the guy some slack. He’s new. But still people are taking this to serious.

I think everyone should calm down and think of the possitive side.

I dont know take a chill pill or something.

Please dont critisise me for saying this, im just speaking out the truth.

EXAMPLES:

Okay, im gonna be 100% honest. Nobody likes recolors and editing shapes! You can do that, just don’t post it on here. If you want to post something on here, make it from scratch!

very amusing
specially the sword cracks me up
[/quote]atleast he can recolour ur just a noob

recolours can go suck my dick there terrible i meen people make tuts then people dont even follow them -.-"
[/quote][quote author=time of rune link=topic=364401.msg2766341#msg2766341 date=1240831612]
Okay, im gonna be 100% honest. Nobody likes recolors and editing shapes! You can do that, just don’t post it on here. If you want to post something on here, make it from scratch!

What people could be saying.[quote author=gary1988 link=topic=364401.msg2766964#msg2766964 date=1240869908]
keep trying d00d, and im sure ur models will progress nice for a first try
[/quote][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=364401.msg2766253#msg2766253 date=1240819234]
It’s a bit of a recolour.
I can just tell.

Try making one from scratch. But i’f its to difficult stick to recolour with primitives. Even i find it hard to make one from scratch. I have to recolour a person and add a little bit of detail and stuff.
[/quote][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=364401.msg2766125#msg2766125 date=1240802175]
T_T

not bad, but not good. you’re right, we all start somewhere. eventually you’ll get the hang of modelling.

Good on those people who supported Nemogiescape.[/quote]

If everyone takes it easy on the people who recolor, there will be even fewer modelers on here than there are now! Think about how many people on here ACTUALY model! Maybe 5 or 6? And now think of the amount of people who just recolor and resize. Like 20 to 30! I swear, my CAT could recolor!
(btw, i dont see what’s wrong with what i said, i just told him that nobody likes recolors…)

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] helpfull feedback
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Give the guy some slack. He’s new. But still people are taking this to serious.

I think everyone should calm down and think of the possitive side.

I dont know take a chill pill or something.

Please dont critisise me for saying this, im just speaking out the truth.

EXAMPLES:

[quote=“ak226688, post:8, topic:275868”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=364401.msg2766419#msg2766419 date=1240840681]

Okay, im gonna be 100% honest. Nobody likes recolors and editing shapes! You can do that, just don’t post it on here. If you want to post something on here, make it from scratch!

[/quote]

[quote author=manmanner link=topic=364401.msg2766427#msg2766427 date=1240841467]
very amusing
specially the sword cracks me up
[/quote]atleast he can recolour ur just a noob

recolours can go suck my dick there terrible i meen people make tuts then people dont even follow them -.-"[/quote][quote=“time of rune, post:5, topic:275868”]Okay, im gonna be 100% honest. Nobody likes recolors and editing shapes! You can do that, just don’t post it on here. If you want to post something on here, make it from scratch![/quote]

What people could be saying.[quote=“gary1988, post:11, topic:275868”]keep trying d00d, and im sure ur models will progress nice for a first try :D[/quote][quote=“TabbyKiller, post:4, topic:275868”]It’s a bit of a recolour.
I can just tell.

Try making one from scratch. But i’f its to difficult stick to recolour with primitives. Even i find it hard to make one from scratch. I have to recolour a person and add a little bit of detail and stuff.[/quote][quote=“dylan_0789, post:2, topic:275868”]T_T

not bad, but not good. you’re right, we all start somewhere. eventually you’ll get the hang of modelling.[/quote]
Good on those people who supported Nemogiescape.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] helpfull feedback
item.dc:creator: @nemoigescape nemoigescape
item.description:
@nemoigescape wrote:

well i took some advice and im following part 3 of silents awsome guide its blooming hard but im getting there hehe managed to draw out a crown and get some faces. it looks like crap but i suppose crap is better than recolouring :S?
